subdisciplines.name: Syro-Palestinian Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the archaeology of the Levant, including modern-day Syria, Lebanon, Jordan, Israel, and Palestine.

subdisciplines.name: Mesopotamian Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the archaeology of the ancient Near East, specifically the region known as Mesopotamia, roughly corresponding to modern-day Iraq.

subdisciplines.name: Egyptian Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the archaeology of ancient Egypt.

subdisciplines.name: Anatolian Archaeology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the archaeology of ancient Anatolia, a region which includes modern-day Turkey.
